resources.string: The app that knows it all
Detailed insight of countries all around the world in a single app
Capitals, currency, borders, timezones and lots more, all at your fingertips
Get all these data even when you are offline, pretty good for a small gk round huh?
Sorry, could not fetch country details from server
You are offline. Would you like to continue with previously downloaded data?
Please turn on your wifi or mobile data to download country details and then press the Sync option at the top right corner of the screen.
Sorry, but not offline data was found. Please enable wifi or mobile data and Sync app by pressing the sync icon at top right corner of the screen.
Please close search by pressing the back button

Prithvi is developed for Techgig mobility hackathon using
1. Android Studio IDE
2. Kotlin and Java as programming language
3. Retrofit for rest api call
4. Realm DB for offline data storage
5. Butterknife for view binding
6.Glide for image loading and caching
7. CircleImageView for crcular imageviews
8. Lottie for loading and displaying lottie anims
9. Anko for making life a little easier

Designed And Developed By Soumen Ganguly
